content: How many miles would a person travel if they walked for 3 hours at a pace of 4 miles per hour?

If a person walks for 3 hours at a pace of 4 miles per hour, they would travel a distance of 12 miles. This is calculated by multiplying the time spent walking (3 hours) by the walking pace (4 miles per hour): 3 hours * 4 miles/hour = 12 miles.
